name: BATTLE TANKS (itch)
description:
BATTLE TANKS is a local 2 player Arcade tanks game inspired by the Atari Tanks Game.The Tanks Game from the Atari was a clear favorite of mine, it has that retro charm but i wondered, "What would it look like if it was made a few years later?".

And within a few hours i had this, My envisionment for the old Red Vs Blue, now BATTLE TANKS!

Made By JoGray , GOOY
